poo

Interface Shape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Square

    public interface Shape
    Shape is the interface that defines the different shapes that will be able to follow the paths.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kylian GERARD and Eug√©nie SHEKA KASONGO
    See Also:
    Path

      • containsMouse

        boolean containsMouse(java.awt.Point position)
        Returns if the position is included in this shape.
        Parameters:
        position - A position in our panel. (used with the position of the mouse when clicking).
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the inclusion of this position in this shape.

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draws this shape in our panel.
        Parameters:
        g - The 2D graphic in which this shape will be drawn.

      • clone

        Shape clone()
        Returns a clone of this shape.
        Returns:
        A Shape representing a new square instance of this shape.

      • equals

        boolean equals(Shape shape)
        Returns if the two shapes are identical.
        Parameters:
        shape - Another shape that we want to compare to this shape.
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the equivalence between these two shapes.
